direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods attempt to remove an element from the queue but throw UnsupportedOperationException.
Both methods interact with the queue but throw UnsupportedOperationException due to unmodifiable nature.
Both methods throw UnsupportedOperationException when attempting to modify the queue.

enhanced_by.reason: The unmodifiableQueue method initializes the queue which is necessary for the poll method to operate.
The iterator method is used to access elements in the queue, which is related to the poll method's operation.
Both methods throw UnsupportedOperationException, which can be used to verify expected behavior in test cases.
